fn.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

JHa and BJG conceived the study. JHa, BJG and KPA participated in the design of the study. JHü, KPA, JB, OC, SAOC, PAD, MD, PDF, MH, AJ, AK, IL, JP and ZAR took part in material collection. JHü carried out the molecular genetic analysis. JHa and JHü analysed the data. JHa drafted the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
